titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to require that new employees of the United States Postal Service have complied with Selective Service registration requirements.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Postal Personnel and Modernization.
Executive Comment Requested from OMB, US Postal Service.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 7/8/1987--Introduced. Requires employees of the U.S. Postal Service (hired after the end of the 90-day period beginning on the date of enactment of this Act) to comply with Selective Service registration requirements.
